📖 Don’t judge a book by its cover...
Read the first chapter of a different unknown book everyday.
Reveal the book title and details at the end of the chapter.
There will also be an Amazon link included when you reveal the title.
📚 Want to see books from previous days?
You can go to the bookshelf for a week-by-week history of previous titles!

resources.string:
Today's Bookle opened with the sentence:

"%1$s"
Can you guess the book? Download the app here: https://github.com/yibenson/Bookle
I read the Bookle on %1$s: %2$s, by the author %3$s.\nDownload the app here: https://github.com/yibenson/Bookle
